locationSection.intro: Dolores is a vibrant, established municipality in the heart of the Costa Blanca, perfectly positioned to offer the ideal Mediterranean lifestyle. This charming urbanization combines authentic Spanish character with modern international community appeal, attracting families, retirees, and investors seeking quality living. The area boasts exceptional infrastructure including top-rated healthcare facilities, international schools with British curricula, and abundant shopping centers featuring major supermarket chains. Dolores offers an authentic Costa Blanca experience with convenient access to world-class beaches, championship golf courses, and a thriving cultural scene. The established international community means English is widely spoken, making it ideal for expat buyers. With property values appreciating at 8% annually and rental yields reaching €800 per week, Dolores represents outstanding investment potential while maintaining 40% lower prices than Spanish island markets.
